dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4292 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 774 Sea Island Pkwy, in Saint Helena Island, South Carolina, as the “Laura Matilda Towne Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Mace introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 774 Sea Island Pkwy, in Saint Helena Island, South Carolina, as the Laura Matilda Towne Post Office Building.

section.header: Laura Matilda Towne Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 774 Sea Island Pkwy, in Saint Helena Island, South Carolina, shall be known and designated as the Laura Matilda Towne Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Laura Matilda Towne Post Office Building.
